```{r}
library(gm)
```



```{r}
the_scale <- c("A3", "C4", "E4", "G4", "B4", "D5", "F5", "A5", "C5", "E5")
stopifnot(length(the_scale) == 10)
```


```{r}
nums_to_notes <- function(nums) {
  pitches <- the_scale[nums + 1]
  Music() +
    Meter(4, 4) +
    Line(pitches = pitches,
         durations = rep("16th", length(pitches))) +
    Instrument(91, 1)
}
```



```{r}
nums_to_notes(sample(0:9, 1000, replace = TRUE)) |>
  export("test.mid")
```
